name: Endless Unknown Maze
description:
Score points and kill enemies while making your way through an endless puzzle maze. Every room is different and randomized, so you never know what puzzles are ahead of you. Your goal is to collects as many points as possible.

Tip: when you kill and enemy, it turns into a solid object. You can use these objects to reach hard to get Points.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse1 to shoot

R to restart

Walk over a yellow point to collect it.
